title.rendered: 3 Bedroom Remodel Ideas To Consider In Vaughan

content.rendered:
If the rooms in your house are beginning to look a little stale, it might be time for a remodel. You can consult some remodelling services in Vaughan and get estimates on what they offer and how much they cost, whether you want to remodel a bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, or another room. Here are three bedroom remodelling ideas for you to consider.

1. Change the Lighting

One of the simplest ways to enhance the mood and ambience of a room is to install new lighting. Plenty of attention goes into how to best light a kitchen or dining area, but people tend to pay less attention to lighting a bedroom. First, think about what you would like as your primary lighting fixture. This is the lighting source that hangs off the ceiling in the middle of the room. Some fixtures that we suggest include:

  • String lights or skylights for a sleek and modern look
  • A chandelier if you are going for a more elegant mood
  • LED lights if you would like something easy to maintain and that will last a long time

Before installing the main lighting fixture, consider how you want the bedroom as a whole to look. You will likely want your lamps and other decorations in the room to blend in well with the overhead light. 

Next, think about where you would like to have other light sources. For example, if you read in bed often, you might want to place some small lights above the bed. Table lamps and floor lamps come in many different varieties and can significantly enhance your bedroom relatively inexpensively. If you are lucky to have lots of natural lighting where you sleep, use this to your advantage during daylight hours.

2. Enhance the Floors

The floors of a bedroom should give off a vibe of comfort and warmth. Most bedrooms are carpeted, and if you wish to change your floors but still have carpet, consider getting a different colour or material for the carpet. For example, some carpets are shaggier than others, giving off an even cozier feeling than standard carpets.

If you would rather not have carpet in your bedroom, either for cleanliness or other reasons, laminate or wood flooring are both excellent options for these spaces. Many people prefer this option to carpet because it is easier to clean, which may be an especially important consideration if you have pets or small children. Place large and small rugs on the floor to enhance the atmosphere and give the room a softer feel. We can help you install new carpet or flooring in your bedroom if you are remodelling.

3. Make Your Space Personal

While you may not want an obvious theme in a bedroom unless you are remodelling the kids’ bedrooms, one thing to consider during a remodelling session is keeping your personality in the room. For example, if you love the ocean, purchasing some wicker furniture is one way to give a room a beachy vibe. Buy some artwork that speaks to you and blends in with your bedroom’s lighting and other materials, and place the art strategically on the walls.

Consider adding colour to your bedroom to add even more personality. Painting can be very messy, so our painting specialists can help you put a fresh coat of paint on one or multiple walls of the bedroom. Different colour shades can help a room feel either larger or smaller, so whatever feel you are going for, there is a shade of paint for you.

Handyman Connection is available for all your remodelling needs. Give us a call if you are considering a new paint job, installing new floors, and more.
